languages.text: "Знаете, {name}, вам повезло, что Глейто не оттяпал вам руку, пока вы отбирали у него инфопластину. Уверен, ему было непросто решить, чья безопасность важнее — ваша или моих записей".
"You know, {name}, you're lucky Glaito didn't rip your arm off when you took the data-slate from him. I'm sure he had a hard time deciding whose safety was more important, yours or my notes'."
languages.original_text: "Знаете, {name}, вам повезло, что Глейто не оттяпал вам руку, пока вы отбирали у него инфопластину. Уверен, ему было непросто решить, чья безопасность важнее — ваша или моих записей".

"You know, {name}, you're lucky Glaito didn't rip your arm off when you took the data-slate from him. I'm sure he had a hard time deciding whose safety was more important, yours or my notes'."

languages.text: 「{name}、あなたは幸運でした。データスレートをグライトから取り上げて、腕をもがれずに済んだのですから。彼も、あなたの安全と私のメモのどちらを守るべきかでずいぶん迷ったに違いありません」
languages.original_text: "You know, {name}, you're lucky Glaito didn't rip your arm off when you took the data-slate from him. I'm sure he had a hard time deciding whose safety was more important, yours or my notes'."

traits.locale_text: 「{name}、あなたは幸運でした。データスレートをグライトから取り上げて、腕をもがれずに済んだのですから。彼も、あなたの安全と私のメモのどちらを守るべきかでずいぶん迷ったに違いありません」

languages.text: "Wisst Ihr, {name}, Ihr hattet Glück, dass Euch Glaito nicht den Arm ausgerissen hat, als Ihr ihm den Datablock abnahmt. Es war sicher schwierig für ihn, zu entscheiden, wessen Sicherheit wichtiger ist, Eure oder die meiner Notizen."
languages.original_text: "You know, {name}, you're lucky Glaito didn't rip your arm off when you took the data-slate from him. I'm sure he had a hard time deciding whose safety was more important, yours or my notes'."

traits.locale_text: "Wisst Ihr, {name}, Ihr hattet Glück, dass Euch Glaito nicht den Arm ausgerissen hat, als Ihr ihm den Datablock abnahmt. Es war sicher schwierig für ihn, zu entscheiden, wessen Sicherheit wichtiger ist, Eure oder die meiner Notizen."

languages.text: « Vous savez, {name}, vous avez de la chance qu'il ne vous ait pas arraché un bras quand vous lui avez pris la plaque de données. Il a dû avoir un mal fou à décider ce qui passait en priorité, votre sécurité ou celle de mes notes. »
languages.original_text: "You know, {name}, you're lucky Glaito didn't rip your arm off when you took the data-slate from him. I'm sure he had a hard time deciding whose safety was more important, yours or my notes'."

traits.locale_text: « Vous savez, {name}, vous avez de la chance qu'il ne vous ait pas arraché un bras quand vous lui avez pris la plaque de données. Il a dû avoir un mal fou à décider ce qui passait en priorité, votre sécurité ou celle de mes notes. »

languages.text: «Sepa usted, {name}, que tiene suerte de que Glaito no le arrancase el brazo cuando le quitó la tablilla de datos. Seguro que le costó horrores decidir si debía proteger mis notas o a su persona».
languages.original_text: "You know, {name}, you're lucky Glaito didn't rip your arm off when you took the data-slate from him. I'm sure he had a hard time deciding whose safety was more important, yours or my notes'."

traits.locale_text: «Sepa usted, {name}, que tiene suerte de que Glaito no le arrancase el brazo cuando le quitó la tablilla de datos. Seguro que le costó horrores decidir si debía proteger mis notas o a su persona».

languages.text: “说真的，{name}，你从格雷托旁边拿走数据板的时候，它没有把你的胳膊扯下来，你的运气真的很好。我相信，它当时肯定是非常努力地思考谁的安全更重要，是你，还是我的数据板。”
languages.original_text: "You know, {name}, you're lucky Glaito didn't rip your arm off when you took the data-slate from him. I'm sure he had a hard time deciding whose safety was more important, yours or my notes'."

traits.locale_text: “说真的，{name}，你从格雷托旁边拿走数据板的时候，它没有把你的胳膊扯下来，你的运气真的很好。我相信，它当时肯定是非常努力地思考谁的安全更重要，是你，还是我的数据板。”

languages.text: "{name}, o databelayı elinden alırken Glaito'nun kolunuzu koparmamış olması şansınıza olmuş. Sizi mi yoksa notlarımı mı koruması gerektiğine zor karar vermiştir."
languages.original_text: "You know, {name}, you're lucky Glaito didn't rip your arm off when you took the data-slate from him. I'm sure he had a hard time deciding whose safety was more important, yours or my notes'."

traits.locale_text: "{name}, o databelayı elinden alırken Glaito'nun kolunuzu koparmamış olması şansınıza olmuş. Kimin emniyetini öncelemesi gerektiğine zor karar vermiştir: Sizin mi yoksa notlarımın mı?"

languages.original_text: "You know, , you're lucky Glaito didn't rip your arm off when you took the data-slate from him. I'm sure he had a hard time deciding whose safety was more important, yours or my notes'."
